title: Poster, "Take-off Poseidon / Mohawk"
signed: Signed [imprinted] in black ink, lower right: John Alcorn
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink, lower margin: Mohawk Paper Mills, Inc., Cohoes, NY 12047; Designed and Illustrated by John Alcorn; Lithographed on Mohawk Poseidon Cover, 65 lb.
description: Poster on white ground featuring an image of a head in profile composed completely by marine life and paraphernalia. The head sits in a lifesaver that reads: POSEIDON. Below, title reads: MOILAWK / TAKE OFF ON POSEIDON.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Take-off Poseidon / Mohawk". Lithograph on paper. 1989-21-15.
